title: Anju to Zushioumaru
synopsis: Anju and Zushioumaru live a peaceful life in rural Japan with their kind and gentle fatherâ€”the steward of the emperor's hunting grounds who teaches his children to respect nature and protect animals. The local lord frames him for burning the hunting grounds; Anju and Zushioumaru, along with their mother and a few animals, escape to Kyoto to ask the emperor to pardon their father.
